meanings.definition: A place where a battle is fought.
meanings.sent1: The soldiers marched onto the battlefield.
meanings.sent2: The generals strategized on the battlefield.
meanings.sent3: The battlefield was surprisingly peaceful after the battle.
meanings.sent4: The classroom turned into a battlefield during the debate.
meanings.sent5: The sun set over the battlefield, painting the sky in hues of orange and red.

meanings.definition: The field or ground on which a battle is fought.
meanings.sent1: The grass on the battlefield was trampled by the soldiers.
meanings.sent2: The battlefield was littered with debris after the conflict.
meanings.sent3: The ants declared war on the beetles in the battlefield of the garden.
meanings.sent4: The basketball court became a battlefield during the intense match.
meanings.sent5: The children played on the battlefield of the playground, imagining epic battles.
